title: WasteWaterTreatment - Tank
description: This entity contains an harmonised description of a generic Tank made for the Wastewater treatment domain. For a given type of tank, all possible variables that can be measures are listed as properties. In the description property, the type of tank (anaerobic, pre-dinitrification, nitrification etc.)can be defined.

DS.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. Dry solids concentration measured in a tank

NH4.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'mg/L'. Ammonia concentration measured in a tank

NO3.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'mg/L'. Nitrate concentration measured in a tank

DO.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'mg/L'. Dissolved oxygen concentration measured in a tank

Redox.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'mV'. Redox level measured in a tank

Sludge Level.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'metre'. Sludge Level measured in a secondary settler tank

TN.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'mg/L'. Total Nitrogen concentration measured in a tank

Temperature.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Unit: 'Celsius'. Water temperature measured in a tank

pH.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Water pH level measured in a tank

startsAt.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the entity the tank is connected to in the upstream point

endsAt.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the entity the tank is connected to in the downstream point
